landing.headingText: One space for all your learning.
landing.subheadingText: Learn from anywhere, anytime. Instant access to all courses and activities.

dashboard.cardSliderSubtitle: Use your dashboard to pin your textbooks and create playlists to share with your class.
dashboard.noBooks_subTitle: Any books you save while browsing the catalog will be added here for you to view later.
dashboard.noPlaylists_subTitle: Any playlists you create will be added here for you to view, share, and use in your classes.

actionCard.actionCardSubtitles: Save your class books to your dashboard to quickly access your book materials.
Any playlists you create will be added here for you to view, share, and use in your classes.

dashboard.removeBook_subTitle: This will remove the book - All Type Book - from your My Books list.

createClassPage.pageSubTitle: Add your class details and start inviting students, creating assignments, and viewing progress.
createClassPage.classSubHeader: Name your class and assign the start and end dates.
createClassPage.selectBook_txt: Assign a book to your class in order to view and assign materials.
createClassPage.titleErrorMsg: Name should be less than 50 characters.
createClassPage.endDateErrorMsg: End Date cannot be less than today's date

successClassPage.successCaption_txt: Your class has been added! Share the class key below to let your students join

myClassPage.classSubHeading: Your current, upcoming and past classes
myClassPage.pageTitleNoClassArchived: See your list of archived classes here
myClassPage.pageSubTitleNoClassArchived: Any class you have archived will appear here. Once archived, you can still view class details. You may restore the class to allow students to rejoin.
myClassPage.noClassTitle: Create a class to get started
myClassPage.noClassSubtitle: Add your classes to invite students and get to all of your class materials.

classDrawerPane.noClassSubtitle: Any classes associated with this book will appear here.
classDrawerPane.classDrawerTitle: Teaching another class with this book?
classDrawerPane.classDrawerSubTitle: Create another class using this textbook material for your students.

editClassPage.pageSubTitle: Edit the Class Name, duration or associated books.
